selections.name: Headbanger
selections.reason: Consistent performer with strong form (2nd, 3rd, 2nd). Looks ready to win.

selections.name: Invincible Lover
selections.reason: Showed improvement to finish 2nd last start. Drawn well.

selections.name: Sassidora
selections.reason: Resuming. Showed ability in previous prep.

selections.name: Congress Of Vienna
selections.reason: First starter from a good stable. Watch market.

danger_horse.name: Invincible Lover
danger_horse.reason: Recent 2nd places him right in the mix if the top pick falters.

selections.name: Cinturato
selections.reason: Placed 3rd in a strong race last start. Ideally drawn.

selections.name: Costa Paros
selections.reason: Runner-up last time out. Consistent type.

selections.name: Sonic Belle
selections.reason: Hayes stable debutant. Trialled well (2nd). Big watch.

selections.name: Kings Domain
selections.reason: First starter from Busuttin & Young yard.

danger_horse.name: Costa Paros
danger_horse.reason: Proven consistency makes him the logical threat.

selections.name: American Wolf
selections.reason: Drops in class from BM84. 3rd last start was solid. The one to beat.

selections.name: Urban Outlook
selections.reason: Winner at BM70 level last start. Stays all day.

selections.name: Mozu Marcassin
selections.reason: Runner-up in BM66 last start. Steps up in class but fit.

selections.name: Midnight Glow
selections.reason: Consistent enough to fill a minor placing.

danger_horse.name: Urban Outlook
danger_horse.reason: Coming off a win and loves the distance.

selections.name: Time Allowed
selections.reason: Lightly raced and placed 3rd last start. Has upside.

selections.name: Jareth
selections.reason: Maher stable runner resuming. Showed promise last prep.

selections.name: Shoeless
selections.reason: Drops back to BM70. Class runner but resuming.

selections.name: Jewel Bay
selections.reason: Mixes form but capable on his day.

danger_horse.name: Jareth
danger_horse.reason: Top stable and drawn the rail. Watch for market moves.

selections.name: Egerton
selections.reason: Drops significantly in grade. Won at this level previously.

selections.name: Supervise
selections.reason: Resuming. Showed good form last preparation (1st, 2nd).

selections.name: Hi Tiago
selections.reason: Last start winner. Confidence is up.

selections.name: Innocent Enuff
selections.reason: Consistent type who is rarely far away.

selections.name: Bons To Riches
selections.reason: Chasing a hat-trick of wins. Drawn barrier 1. Hard to knock.

selections.name: Warrior Within
selections.reason: Flying with 3 wins in a row. Wide gate is the only concern.

selections.name: Conchiero
selections.reason: Solid 2nd in BM70 last start. Well placed here.

selections.name: Le Ferrari
selections.reason: Consistent veteran. Drops in grade.

danger_horse.name: Warrior Within
danger_horse.reason: Winning form is hard to ignore despite the barrier.

selections.name: Nostro Roccia
selections.reason: Broke maiden status last start. Stable in form.

selections.name: Topmost
selections.reason: Consistent (1st, 3rd, 2nd). Won maiden last start.

selections.name: Rock Them Jools
selections.reason: Waller runner. Always respect the stable.

selections.name: Florina Region
selections.reason: Won maiden two starts back. Drawn well.
